title: [Large-Scale] Gamification-Based Corporate Mathematical Decision-Making Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis and financial calculation skills
context.additional_context: Ensuring accessibility via smartphone-based platforms and utilizing basic LMS functions for project submissions.

learning_goals: Learners can establish optimal resource allocation strategies using mathematical modeling in uncertain business environments.
Learners improve decision-making processes by analyzing data and outcomes generated in gamified environments.
Learners complete project deliverables through team-based simulations and self-evaluate based on established criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
